name: Matematif
description:
Chill and quirky dedective game with its weird ass characters and kinky mathematics 🤓 This is a game of passion... that is a lie, actually no that is not a lie, but it is not true either atleast not anymore. I've made this game 4 years ago, and it was my BIGGEST game, i've made this in 4 months with no help. It was for a big, education game making compation !! ... Sadly i didnt win that and got reaallllyy depressed. Dropped the project too, sometimes later i've tried to pick it up again here and there but never that spark you know, ... Not in this year 2021 tho, this year showed me and teached my SO MUCH ! So i gathered up my determination and finished this old ass project of mine in 2 months even tho there is a high chance that noone will ever gonna play it but fck it, i am finally FREE !! -CONTROLS-

Control's are changeable inside main menu but here are the default one's.

Movement = (W-A-S-D) Crouch = (CTRL) Dash = (SPACE) Run = (SHIFT) -------------------------- Shoot = (LMB) Interact = (E) Reload = (R) Main menu = (Esc)

-Remastered in (2) Months, so in total it is made in (6) months.

NO CALCULATOR IS ALLOWED 😉
